Room.Name: Waterfront Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Waterfront Way, south of the DeNail Corn Fields.
Room.LongDescription: The DeNail Corn Fields provide much of the corn required by many of the ranches for their herds, as well as for public consumption. Corn is one of the more basic commodities of the town, and such as it is, it usually fetches a high price. The Oceancrest Stables and Walking Yards are located on the south side of the street.
